bibdata.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard for Information technology--Microprocessor systems--Control and Status Registers (CSR) Architecture for microcomputer buses
ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard for Information technology--Microprocessor systems--Control and Status Registers (CSR) Architecture for microcomputer buses

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The document structure and notation are described, and the objectives and scope of the CSR Architecture are outlined. Transition set requirements, node addressing, node architectures, unit architectures, and CSR definitions are set forth. The ROM specification and bus standard requirements are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
